price: Ntumwa y’Imana! Ababangikanyamana barakubaza ku vyerekeye guhanwa ku musi w’izuka, ko ari ivy’ukuri! Bishure uti: “Ego cane, ndarahiye kw’izina ry’Imana yanje Rurema Allah, ni ivy’ukuri koko, kandi na mwe ntimuzonanira Imana Allah ko Ibazura, Ikanabahembera ivyo mwakoze”.
arabic: ۞ وَيَسۡتَنۢبِـُٔونَكَ أَحَقٌّ هُوَۖ قُلۡ إِي وَرَبِّيٓ إِنَّهُۥ لَحَقّٞۖ وَمَآ أَنتُم بِمُعۡجِزِينَ

meta.transliteration: wayastanbiūnaka aḥaqqun huwa qul ī warabbī innahu laḥaqqun wamā antum bimuʿ'jizīna
translations: And they ask you to inform
